definition: to obey an order/to comply/to do sb's bidding/to do as requested

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
deference is no substitute for obedience (idiom)/(said to accept sb's request, invitation etc)
pinyin: gong1 jing4 bu4 ru2 cong2 ming4

definition: to not dare to disobey an order (idiom)
difficult to obey orders (idiom); much to my embarrassment, I am unable to comply

sentences.english: Roderigo defied the old gentleman and refused to stir.
sentences.chinese: 羅特克還敢公然反抗那個老紳士，拒絕從命。

sentences.english: You should get the command specifier from the command manager and, then, set.
sentences.chinese: 你應該得到的命令從命令符和管理，那麼，設置。

sentences.english: When working in a batch, we set all the parameters from the command line.
sentences.chinese: 當以批處理方式工作時，我們從命令行設置所有參數。

sentences.english: Invoke the file from a command line, or click it depending on your operating system. The script putters around for a while before outputting something like this
sentences.chinese: 從命令行調用文件，或者根據操作系統單擊文件。

sentences.english: Mechanically I obeyed, turned eastwards, and with my cutlass raised, ran round the corner of the house.
sentences.chinese: 我機械地服從命令向東轉，舉着彎刀跑步繞過屋角。

sentences.english: This section examines two techniques for running a script from the command line.
sentences.chinese: 本節介紹從命令行運行腳本的兩種方法。

sentences.english: The dispute was touched off by the dismissal of a workman for insubordination.
sentences.chinese: 這次爭端是由解僱一名不服從命令的工人引起的。

sentences.english: The drums sounded and instead of following the commands, the girls simply giggled and blushed.
sentences.chinese: 戰鼓敲響了，但女孩們沒有服從命令，只是臉紅傻笑。

sentences.english: Make sure you listen closely and follow the commands.
sentences.chinese: 你們一定要仔細聽並聽從命令。

sentences.english: Follow orders and hold your fire.
Three of them were punished for disobeying orders.
sentences.chinese: 他們當中有三個人因爲不服從命令受到懲罰。

sentences.english: Thanks for listening. See you next time.
sentences.chinese: 你們一定要仔細聽並聽從命令。

sentences.english: The reason why officers are not afraid of war is because of following commands.
sentences.chinese: 士卒之所以不怕打仗，在於服從命令。

sentences.english: If you receive a request like this, you cannot fail to obey it.
sentences.chinese: 如不美觀你接到一種象這樣的請求，你不成能不從命。

sentences.english: It is preferable to start the capture and apply programs from the command line during testing.
sentences.chinese: 在測試期間從命令行啓動捕獲和應用程序更可取。
